get.summary:
Returns a collection which the user has access to

(Either its own collection or a public one)
Returns a specific collection entry based on game ID

Finds new notifications that have been created after last checked time.
Returns an empty array on first connection.
TODO: Move this endpoint to {@link ExternalGameService}
Used to access other users' profiles
Retrieves basic stats for a user profile
Returns time to beat information for one game, if available.
Returns time to beat information for each gameId, if available.

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description:
Criteria to be used for deciding on what to recommend.
E.g. finished games, genre of played games, etc.

info.title: GameNode API
info.description:
API docs for the videogame catalog system GameNode.

Built with love by the GameNode team.

uid.description:
Corresponds to the game id on the target source (see GameExternalGameCategory).
It's called uid, not uuid.

id.description: Should be mapped to the IGDB ID of the game.

source.description: Oh dear maintainer, please forgive me for using transient fields.

ownedPlatforms.description: The platforms on which the user owns the game.

defaultEntryStatus.description: The default status for collection entries added to this collection.

totalItems.description: Total number of items available for the current query

totalPages.description: Total number of pages available for the current query

hasNextPage.description: If this query allows for a next page

userId.description:
Shareable string ID

Same as SuperTokens' userId.

follower.description: User that is following another user.

followerUserId.description: User that is following another user.

profile.description: The associated profile with this Activity (e.g. user who performed an action)

ids.description:
If this is supplied, filtering will be done only for entities specified here.
Useful to filter data received from entities which hold game ids (like GameStatistics, Reviews, etc.)

reviewId.description:
Usually, this property should not be used unless a specific review needs to be retrieved, and it's easier to just
call the statistics controller.

content.description: HTML content of the user's comment.

profileUserId.description: User id of the author of this comment

content.description: HTML content of the user's comment.

profileUserId.description: User id of the author of this comment

content.description: HTML content of the user's comment.

profileUserId.description: User id of the author of this comment

sourceType.description: Indexed to improve speed when filtering by type.

targetProfile.description: Profile that is being target of a report

closeProfile.description: User responsible for closing this report

closeHandleAction.description: Action taken when closing this report

category.description: What this notification's about. E.g.: a new like, a new follower, a game launch, etc.

profile.description: User responsible for generating this notification (e.g. user that liked a review).

profileUserId.description:
User responsible for generating this notification (e.g. user that liked a review).
When null/undefined, the notification was generated by the 'system'.

targetProfile.description:
User which is the target for this notification.
If this is empty (null/undefined), the notification is targeted at all users.
Not to be confused with the 'profile' property.

targetProfileUserId.description:
User which is the target for this notification.
If this is empty (null/undefined), the notification is targeted at all users.
Not to be confused with the 'profile' property.

uid.description:
Corresponds to the game id on the target source (see GameExternalGameCategory).
It's called uid, not uuid.

achievementId.description: Achievement id specified in entries for achievements.data.ts

featuredAchievementIds.description:
Obtained achievements ids passed here will be marked as featured, while ids not present will be automatically
marked not featured.

userId.description: Should be the same as the profile's UserId

levelUpExpCost.description: Threshold XP to hit the next user-level

expMultiplier.description: The multiplier to apply to all exp gains

hasNextPage.description: If this query allows for a next page

totalEstimatedPlaytime.description: Total playtime spent on games, based on available data import from user's connections.

reviewedCount.description: Number of items in period that have been reviewed. Not available to "playtime" criteria.

criteriaId.description:
Id of the criteria being used.
E.g. the id of a 'GameGenre' entity.

criteriaName.description:
Criteria being used as basis for this distribution.
E.g. The name of a 'GameGenre', the name of a Game's category (game, dlc, etc)

count.description:
Total number of times this criteria appears.
E.g. the number of games of 'adventure' genre a user has.

finishedCount.description:
Total number of items of this criteria that have been 'finished'. E.g. finished 'adventure' genre games.
Not avaiable in {@link ProfileMetricsTypeDistributionBy#STATUS}.

totalPlaytimeSeconds.description: Total playtime for this game, in seconds.
Total playtime for this game, in seconds.
Total playtime for this game, in seconds.
Total playtime for this game, in seconds.

main.description: Average time (in seconds) to finish the game to its credits without spending notable time on extras such as side quests.

mainPlusSides.description: Average time (in seconds) to finish the game while mixing in some extras such as side quests without being overly thorough.

completionist.description: Average time (in seconds) to finish the game to 100% completion.

submitCount.description: Total amount of time to beat submissions for this game (in IGDB)

uid.description:
Corresponds to the game id on the target source (see GameExternalGameCategory).
It's called uid, not uuid.

preferredPlatformId.description: The preferred platform to use when adding this importer item to a user's collection.

isImporterViable.description:
If this connection can be used by the importer system to import games
e.g.: Steam, PSN

isImporterWatchViable.description:
If this connection can be used by the importer watch system to periodically
check for new importable games
e.g.: Steam

userIdentifier.description:
A string representing a username, user id or profile URL for the target connection
e.g. a Steam's profile URL

content.description: HTML content of the user's comment.

profileUserId.description: User id of the author of this comment

content.description: HTML content of the user's comment.

profileUserId.description: User id of the author of this comment

content.description: HTML content of the user's comment.

profileUserId.description: User id of the author of this comment

sourceId.description:
UUID of the target entity. Comments can only be attributed to
UUID based entities.

id.description:
The provided identifier for this tag.
It should be a lowercase version of the tag's name.

image.description: The main presentation image for this post.

review.description: If this is present, this blog post is a game review.

globalPercentage.description: Global percentage of users that own this achievement (essentially represents rarity).

platformIds.description:
Related GamePlatform references.
Usually, an achievement is only related to one platform.

status.description: Status of the game (e.g., Finished, Started, etc.)

entries.description: List of games and their statuses for the day

years.description: Group of collection entries by year

platformIds.description:
Related GamePlatform references.
Usually, an achievement is only related to one platform.
The {@link GamePlatform}s this entry relates to.

date.description:
Date for the staus of 'collection_entry_status', and date the achievement was obtained for 'obtained_achievement'
In 'DD-MM-YYYY' format.

Date used as criteria to group related entries.
In 'DD-MM-YYYY' format.
Entries will be grouped by this.

type.description:
Type used as criteria to group related entries.
Entries will be grouped by this.

platformIds.description: The {@link GamePlatform}s this entry relates to. THIS IS NOT USED AS A GROUPING KEY.

date.description: Date normalized to the 'day' level. In the 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

year.description: The corresponding year this event should take place in.

isGOTY.description: If this category corresponds to the 'global' goty award.
If this category corresponds to the 'global' goty award.
